articles.author: Nimesh Vora
articles.title: Rupee to fall on dollar recovery on signs US job market remains robust - Reuters.com
articles.description: The Indian rupee is expected to decline on Friday after the number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, lifting the U.S. dollar and U.S. yields.
articles.content: MUMBAI, July 21 (Reuters) - The Indian rupee is expected to decline on Friday after the number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, lifting the U.S. d… [+2082 chars]

articles.title: Science News Roundup: How El Nino is helping drive heatwaves and extreme weather; Self-healing metal? It's not just the stuff of science fiction and more - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Scientists told Reuters that climate change and El Nino are the major drivers of extreme heat that have seen temperature records broken in Beijing and Rome, while leaving some 80 million Americans under excessive heat warnings.  Self-healing metal?
